original_text: “‘Now this is the law of the Nazirite when the period of their dedication is over. They are to be brought to the entrance to the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 나실인의 법은 이러하니라 자기의 몸을 구별한 날이 차면 그 사람을 회막 문으로 데리고 갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: Now this is the law of the Nazirite
when the period of their dedication is over
They are to be brought to the entrance
to the entrance to the tent of meeting
